product_overview: Vibefolio is a portfolio platform designed specifically for AI creators and Vibecoders, providing an interactive community and showcase space for creative projects utilizing AI.
core_goals: Provide AI creatives and Vibecoders with a dedicated platform to showcase their portfolios.
Enable quick MVP development to gather user feedback and attract users rapidly.
Facilitate effective communication and interaction between portfolio creators and viewers.
Support project visibility through portfolio creation, sharing, and engagement.
Offer comprehensive profile management and social features such as likes, comments, and follower tracking.
key_features: User personal archive and profile pages including uploaded projects, likes, following and follower counts.
Portfolio management for projects with registration, listing, detailed views, and profile exposure.
Interaction features such as likes, comments, 1:1 inquiries (proposal), and sharing.
Main landing page with category filters and project discovery via a banner slider and project card layout.
User authentication with login, social login (Google), registration with validation including nickname and category preferences.
User dashboard (My Page) to manage own projects, wishlist, comments, 1:1 inquiries, and profile settings.
Connection marketplace for job postings and outsourcing requests with detailed project/job descriptions and proposal features.
user_flow_summary: User accesses the main landing page to browse projects using category filters and banner slides.
User selects a project card to view detailed project information including description, technologies, likes, comments, and sharing options.
User logs in or registers if needed via email or Google social login.
Upon login, user accesses My Page to manage their projects, wishlist, comments, and 1:1 inquiries.
User uses the connection menu to navigate to job postings and outsourcing request listings and submit proposals.
Users interact with projects by liking, commenting, sharing, and sending proposals through project detail pages.
validation_criteria: Profile pages accurately display user information including projects, counts of likes, followers, and following.
Projects are properly registered, listed, detailed, and visible on user profiles and main listings.
Interaction features like likes, comments, proposals, and sharing work seamlessly and persist correctly.
Authentication and authorization workflows are secure and reliable, supporting email and social login.
The user dashboard allows full management of projects, comments, and inquiries with visible updates.
The connection marketplace shows current job and outsourcing opportunities with detailed info and proposal submission functionality.
UI components including header, footer, banners, cards, and dialogs are consistent and responsive across devices.
